DOC.brief_summary: Ovarian reserve influenced by many factor but especially cysts like endometrioma. Anti mullerian hormone is recent marker for ovarian reserve. The investigators are searching ovarian reserve pre and post operatively by using antimullerian hormone of endometrioma patient who are operated for their cysts.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Anti Mullerian Hormone for Ovarian Reserve Determination of Preoperative and Postoperative Endometrioma Patients
DOC.criteria: Ultrasonographical symptomatic and benign cysts which has surgery indication. Over 42 years old, systemic endocrine disorder, history of ovarian surgery
